page.title: 12HOLMAN BROS OF CAMBORNE
page.content: { Holmans}was founded in a works slump by Nicholas Holman.His sons took over in{1862}when he died at the age of 85. The founder of the Camborne works was {John Holman,1819-1890.}The buisness was{founded in 1839.}He made machinery for the local community,his products were far more wide-ranging than those of his brothers.In his catalogue of 1879 it describes him as a "Brass & Iron founder" But out of all his products the most important were his spread horizontal engines which were adapted to many different industries. Holmans today employs many people local to Camborne. They supply pnuematic components to all over the world.
